channel.title: Betrayer
channel.description: Me and my friend were discussing a few things one was regarding that fact where jews killed jesus or not. I got to thinking, of a betrayer was soo much of a betrayer, that he betrayed his title of a betrayer by not betraying is he or is he not then a betrayer? Because in the act of not betraying, he betrayed.

item.title: Betrayer
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

PaulT:

[quote=“the fu superior”]got to thinking, of a betrayer was soo much of a betrayer, that he betrayed his title of a betrayer by not betraying

Choosing to label somebody a betrayer is just a judgment made by you. What constitutes a betrayer? Whether somebody fulfills that role is situational. If we say in every situation a hypothetical person fulfills the opposite of their duty and does the reverse of what they know and feel to be right, that is only based on their perception of their duty and right, the terms are so subjective and individualistic it is difficult to extrapolate on the function of a traitorous person. Consider the archetype of the joker, for example Loki or the Coyote, and how by nature the trickster assumes no predictable or definable role.[/quote]
No. Hes a person. Not a Coyote

Read full topic

item.title: Betrayer
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

got to thinking, of a betrayer was soo much of a betrayer, that he betrayed his title of a betrayer by not betraying

Choosing to label somebody a betrayer is just a judgment made by you. What constitutes a betrayer? Whether somebody fulfills that role is situational. If we say in every situation a hypothetical person fulfills the opposite of their duty and does the reverse of what they know and feel to be right, that is only based on their perception of their duty and right, the terms are so subjective and individualistic it is difficult to extrapolate on the function of a traitorous person. Consider the archetype of the joker, for example Loki or the Coyote, and how by nature the trickster assumes no predictable or definable role.

Read full topic

item.title: Betrayer

item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“phonnygoblin, post:5, topic:264297”][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=349030.msg2683582#msg2683582 date=1235524928]

So you have a friend

Fuck off you douche bag. No one thinks you’re funny.
[/quote]

Although that’s 100% true, nobody likes you either.[/quote]
This keeps going back and forth. The only people who DO insult me are nobodies. Someone punch me so i can see stars. Mopman, spel, someone insult me.
